article:
Jack is from America.He lives in Beijing now.He likes going to the _ at the weekends.
Today he wants to see an English movie.It's said the movie is very _ .He asks his friend Tony to go with him,but Tony is _ ,so Jack goes to the movie himself.After he goes into the cinema ,he _ his seat easily.It's a good seat to see the movie. _ when the movie is on,two girls behind him talk aloud al l the time.Jack is a little _ because he can't enjoy the movie.He doesn't know _ to say to the two girls because he can _ only a little Chinese.A few minutes later ,a man _ a flashlight comes in.He asks the two girls to _ talking.Then Jack can see the
